title: looking to manage/ coach a team
body:
hey guys i have been playing league since 2010 i know a lot about the history of the game and i also know the up to date meta, the reason i am wanting to become manager or coach or etc,
 is because i have always wanted this role in a serious team, i used to manage and play my old team on LOL and i also managed coached and played with the pMuJ clan, 
i have a lot of experience with managing, i may be young but i know what i'm doing, of course at the start its going to be hard writing notes and giving feedback as i will have only met for such a short time, but after a couple of weeks there should be a lot of consistency with helping out. (sorry this was made really quick as i'm at work) hah aha.

replies.body:
i coached an amateur league team back in the day, they are not around anymore. 
(2011 i think it was) i knew the fellas outside of the game so we went to either an internet cafe as a team or we took our laptops and or pc's to a mates house.
(nothing to do with league) i coached a semi pro team for call of duty from cod4 to black ops 3. we won a couple of comps.
i can analyst but i don't know how "good" i will be as i said in the bulk i need a couple weeks to find my feet no matter what as it is a bunch of new people i am meeting for the first time and i have to get to know them and learn there gameplay and what not.
https://twitter.com/SubZeroESC heres a reference to us add me on league if u are keen to have a chat about the opportunity
